column2: This room appears to be an old armory< with old weapon and armor stands. A few rusty swords< broken armor pieces< and scraps of leather lie strewn about.
This once %room% has fallen into disrepair. %A_Adj% %furnish% and %furnish_s% lay strewn about.
Once %a_room% with %adj% %furnish_s% and %adj% %furnish_s%< a still smoldering campfire smokes in the center of the room.
This old barracks still has bed frames with moldy mattresses. A %smell% smell fills the room.
An old broken %furnish% lies in pieces in the corner.
This room may have been %a_room%. An old dusty %furnish% and %a_adj% %furnish% are all that's left.
This empty room has %stuff% in the corner.
This %room% is empty< except for %stuff% and %a_furnish%.
